mean_cn: v.掌掴，拍打；  n.掌掴，拍击声
mean_en: to hit somebody/something with the flat part of your hand; to put something on a surface in a quick, careless and often noisy way, especially because you are angry; to hit against something with the noise of somebody being slapped
sentence: He was so angry that he slapped his friend.
sentence_trans: 他很生气，扇了他朋友一耳光。
